RelatedSentence: Police say there were at least four separate apparent sling - shot attacks on the weekend apparently from an overhead railway bridge at Lapstone .
A 52 - year - old woman has cuts on her lips and chin after a large rock shattered the window of the car she was travelling in on the highway at about 9 am on Sunday .
A 52 - year - old woman has cuts on her lips and chin after a large rock shattered the window of the car she was travelling in on the highway at about 9 am on Sunday .
A 52 - year - old woman has cuts on her lips and chin after a large rock shattered the window of the car she was travelling in on the highway at about 9 am on Sunday .
A short time later , a 43 - year - old man and his seven - year - old daughter were lucky to avoid injury after their car was hit by a large rock at the same location .
Police said a minibus was also struck with a large rock as it neared the overhead bridge at about the same time .
The incidents on Sunday came after a similar attack at the same location at about 4 pm on Saturday in which a rock struck the windscreen of a van with 19 passengers on board .
Police are appealing for anyone who witnessed the incidents or any suspicious behaviour in the area to come forward .
